venue.address_1: Boston Common (next to Park St. MBTA)
venue.name: Freedom Trail

item.description:
Walk the historic Freedom Trail in downtown Boston for Ron Paul as part of the 'All America Walk for Ron Paul'. October is also busy time of the year along the Trail and at the city's historic sites.

We will meet at the Boston Common, next to the Park Street MBTA subway station, at 11:00 am and carry along our Ron Paul signs (Bring your own) as we walk.....

Here's a map of the Freedom Trail:

http://www.boston.com...
item.name: All-America FREEDOM TRAIL Walk for Ron Paul
